General Screens contains all the necessary standard screens which are required for any app project. Get a perfect template for pages like Login, Registration, Password Reset, Push Notification, Time and Date Picker and many many more. 22+22+22 screens (consisting of light, dark and blue mode) that will save you a lot of time.

  • Mobile Screens (Login, Registration, Password Reset, Push Notification, Time and Date Picker and many more)
  • Dark, Light and Blue Mode suitable for any situation
  • Fully layered & vector based
  • Component library for quick and super easy use
  • Free Font typography based on the inter font family
  • Compatible with Figma, Sketch and Adobe XD
